statements: SELECT * FROM football_injuries WHERE player_id = 100
SELECT player_id, injury_type, injury_date FROM football_injuries WHERE recovery_time > 30
SELECT injury_type, medical_evaluation FROM football_injuries WHERE fitness_level = 'Good'
SELECT player_id, injury_date, recovery_time FROM football_injuries ORDER BY recovery_time ASC
SELECT * FROM football_injuries WHERE injury_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM football_injuries WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, injury_type, injury_date FROM football_injuries WHERE recovery_time > 30 ORDER BY injury_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, injury_type, recovery_time FROM football_injuries WHERE fitness_level = 'Low' AND medical_evaluation LIKE '%severe%';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(injury_type) AS total_injuries FROM football_injuries GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_injuries > 2;
SELECT player_id, injury_type, injury_date, recovery_time, medical_evaluation, fitness_level FROM football_injuries WHERE player_id IN (3, 5, 7) ORDER BY player_id ASC, injury_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM football_injuries;
SELECT player_id, injury_type, injury_date FROM football_injuries ORDER BY injury_date;
SELECT * FROM football_injuries WHERE injury_type = 'Sprain';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS num_injuries FROM football_injuries GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, MAX(injury_date) AS last_injury FROM football_injuries GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM football_injuries WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, injury_type FROM football_injuries WHERE injury_type LIKE 'Sprain%' ORDER BY injury_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, injury_date, description FROM football_injuries WHERE player_id = 2 AND injury_type = 'Fracture';
SELECT evaluation_id, player_id, evaluation_date FROM medical_evaluations WHERE medical_condition IS NOT NULL ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS num_injuries FROM football_injuries GROUP BY player_id HAVING num_injuries > 2 ORDER BY num_injuries DESC;
SELECT * FROM FootballInjuries WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT injury_type, injury_date FROM FootballInjuries WHERE injury_type = 'Knee Sprain';
SELECT player_id, MAX(fitness_score) AS max_fitness_score FROM PlayerFitnessLevels;
SELECT player_id, evaluation_result FROM MedicalEvaluations WHERE evaluation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, injury_type, injury_date FROM FootballInjuries ORDER BY injury_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM FootballInjuries WHERE injury_type = 'ACL Injury';
SELECT player_id, injury_type FROM FootballInjuries WHERE injury_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT player_id, MAX(fitness_score) AS max_fitness_score FROM PlayerFitnessLevels GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM MedicalEvaluations WHERE evaluation_result LIKE '%Good%' ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, injury_type, evaluation_result FROM FootballInjuries INNER JOIN MedicalEvaluations ON FootballInjuries.player_id = MedicalEvaluations.player_id;
SELECT * FROM injuries;
SELECT injury_type, injury_date FROM injuries WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_position FROM players ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM players WHERE player_position = 'Goalkeeper';
SELECT player_id, MAX(fitness_rating) AS max_fitness_rating FROM fitness_levels GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_position FROM players WHERE team_name = 'Barcelona';
SELECT player_name, injury_type FROM players INNER JOIN injuries ON players.player_id = injuries.player_id;
SELECT player_name, evaluation_result FROM players LEFT JOIN evaluations ON players.player_id = evaluations.player_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT player_position) AS total_positions FROM players;
SELECT * FROM Injuries;
SELECT player_id, injury_type FROM Injuries WHERE recovery_time > 20;
SELECT player_id, injury_date FROM Injuries WHERE injury_id = 5;
SELECT team_name, coach_name FROM Teams WHERE team_rank < 3;
SELECT player_name, nationality FROM Players WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Injuries WHERE recovery_time > 10 ORDER BY injury_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, nationality FROM Players WHERE team_id = 3 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, coach_name FROM Teams WHERE team_rank < 5 AND coach_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT evaluation_id, player_id, evaluation_result FROM Medical_Evaluations ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC;
SELECT player_name, fitness_level, last_fitness_update FROM Players JOIN Player_Fitness ON Players.player_id = Player_Fitness.player_id WHERE fitness_level = 'Excellent';
